1370: Havix moved to Muelen straet.A.1 after marriage.
Got married to Jacomin at age 26 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Jacomin, Reynwi, at age 26.
1371: Had a daughter with Jacomin, Hildeburgis, at age 27.
1375: Had a daughter with Jacomin, Riet, at age 31.
1376: Had a daughter with Jacomin, Folqui, at age 32.
1378: Had a daughter with Jacomin, Hille, at age 34.
1381: Had a son with Jacomin, Wigboldo, at age 37.
1382: Had a son with Jacomin, Ricout, at age 38.
1384: Lost son Ricout when Ricout was 3 years old.
1385: Had a daughter with Jacomin, Rabburgis, at age 41.
1389: Had a daughter with Jacomin, Hildeburgis, at age 45.
